top.title: Venezuela swears in interim president after defiant Maduro pleads not guilty
top.summary: Delcy Rodríguez said she was pained by what she called the "kidnapping" of President Nicolás Maduro and his wife by the US.

top.title: 'I'm a prisoner of war' - In the room for Maduro's dramatic court hearing
top.summary: During the 40-minute arraignment, Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, pleaded not guilty to drugs and weapon charges.

top.title: Trump warns new Venezuelan leader as Maduro set to appear in court
top.summary: Trump said Venezuela's interim president Delcy Rodríguez could "pay a very big price, probably bigger than Maduro" if she "doesn't do what's right".

top.title: Ofcom asks X about reports its Grok AI makes sexualised images of children
top.summary: Elon Musk's social media platform has warned users not to use Grok to generate illegal content.

top.title: Car giant Hyundai to use human-like robots in factories
top.summary: The firm plans to deploy the technology at the same plant that was involved in a huge immigration raid in 2025.

top.title: Watch: BBC reporter tests AI anti-shoplifting tech
top.summary: Some major retailers and independent stores have introduced AI body scans, CCTV or facial recognition equipment to identify crimes like shoplifting.

title.#text: Nvidia’s GeForce Now is getting native Linux and Fire TV apps
Nvidia’s new G-Sync monitors automatically adjust brightness just like a laptop
Nvidia announces DLSS 4.5 with 6x Frame Generation and improved image quality
